title: The end of the Bezos era, SpaceX for civilians, and a stock prediction
description:
Kara and Scott talk about Jeff Bezos stepping away from his role as CEO of Amazon and moving into the Executive Chair position. They talk about Elon Musks' plans to send a civilian crew to space by the end of the year in hopes of ushering in a new era of space travel. In listener mail, a young Facebook employee asks if the company has any redeeming qualities. And Scott has more predictions on GameStop stock.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
